title: Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 39 of 2024) hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 

2024 (Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited housing (miscellaneous provisions) act 2024 (commencement) order 2024

title: Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 39 of 2024) hereby order as
heading: 2. The 18th day of November 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 18th day of November 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 39 of 2024) shall come into 
operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

7 November, 2024. 

DARRAH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 12th November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [627] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
